Name: Infected Town
About the game: You are a special purpose soldier and your goal is to destroy some settlement, which is inhabited by a bunch of sorcerers. Infected Town is a top-down wave shooter where you have to survive waves of advancing enemies and destroy them. Between certain waves, you can choose an upgrade for your weapon. On the last wave, you need to destroy the boss and his minions.
